wikipedia_page.main: Christos Lazari (May 1946 – 27 July 2015) was a Cyprus-born British billionaire property developer.

response: *Chris Lazari, 69, Cypriot-born British property developer, heart attack.Cypriot billionaire Chris Lazari dies aged 69
Maritsa Lazari  (born October 1943) is a Cyprus-born British billionaire businesswoman. She was married to the Cyprus-born British billionaire property developer Chris Lazari until his death in 2015.
Lazari met her future husband and fellow Cypriot Chris Lazari in the UK and the couple married in 1965.
Chris Lazari created a successful fashion line, Drendie Girl, and in 1978 the couple used profits from the company to invest in commercial property.
